page.title: 15Health - Yardley
page.content: A Week in the Life of a local Doctor:- There are 5 doctors at the surgery visited.Surgery opens from 8:30am to 12:30pm and 4:30pm to 6:30pm.The busiest day is Monday morning as the surgery is closed over the week-end apart from an emergency service on Saturday am .An appointment system is used,the time allocated to patients is 5 to 10 minutes but a serious illness can take 15 minutes.Doctor Jeavons sees about 180 patients in a week. In all 800 patients visit the surgery weekly.The most common illnesses are respiratory,womens illnesses and psychological problems. Doctor Jeavons has about 75 weekly home visits.Mostly because the patient is too old or because of heart illness. There are about 6 emergencies monthly. 50% of patients receive prescriptions.
